metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21030 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Jupyter Notebook before 5.5.0 does not use a CSP header to treat servedfiles as belonging to a separate origin. Thus, for example, an XSS payloadcan be placed in an SVG document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21030` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.7.8-1
python-notebook - 5.7.8-1
python3-notebook - 5.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.8-1').
